title: Movie News Round-Up plus Fallout Interviews feat Ella Purnell and Walton Goggins
content: Fallout has landed - all eight episodes of it - and with it comes some interviews with BBC Radio 1's answer to "The Ghoul", Ali Plumb, as Ella Purnell, Aaron Moten, Kyle MacLachlan, Walton Goggins and more sit down to try and make sense of the post-apocalypse. Plus, a quick round-up of the biggest blockbuster news stories of the past couple of weeks, including the MONSTER trailers that have landed lately. Yep, Joker, we're looking at you here.

itunes.subtitle: Ali chats with cast and crew of post-apocalypse TV adaptation of Fallout.
